lead_paragraph: A decision by the European Central Bank to keep interest rates the same was not a huge surprise, but some had hoped for a stimulus extension.

headline.print_headline: Falling Technology and Consumer Stocks Drag Down Wall Street
headline.main: Wall St. Sags Under Falling Tech and Consumer Stocks

snippet: A decision by the European Central Bank to keep interest rates the same was not a huge surprise, but some had hoped for a stimulus extension....
abstract: Stocks decline modestly as technology and consumer-focused companies slide; bond yields rise following decision by European Central Bank to leave its key interest rates unchanged.
